modName: aMidianBorn wolf armor and skyforge weapons
summary:
High-quality, high-resolution, handmade texture replacer for the wolf armor set ,
skyforge weapons, including bow arrows and hammers ,
Wuuthrad, shield of Ysgramor.
descriptionHtml:
[size=3][b][color=red]Distribution permission[/color][/b]: This file is a [b]Nexus-exclusive release[/b], please respect my decision and DO NOT reupload it elsewhere... I did not give, nor want to give permission for any kind of reupload.[/size]

[img]http://i.minus.com/ibvdOZPEzdswrw.png[/img]
[center][size=1][color=grey]Claymora is wearing Killer Keos [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/3654]Skimpy CBBE[/url] Mesh Replacer for the Wolf Armor [/color][/size]

[size=6] HD Retextures for the Wolf Armor set + Skyforge Weaponry+Wuuthrad+shield of Ysgramor [/size]
[size=3](including an esp-file > so the Skyforge Weapons use their new unique textures properly)[/center]
v2.1 changelog: added shield of Ysgramor, reworked Wuuthrad, now included in main files.
>>> complete<<<
V2 changelog:
 SKYFORGE WEAPONRY INCLUDES NOW ALSO MACE, WARHAMMER, BOW & QUIVER, WOLFSHIELD,
WEAPONS AVAILABLE ON NPCS, AND TO BUY FROM EORLUND. NEW ESP IS COMPATIBLE WITH SKY-RE AND ANY OTHER MODIFICATION
EXPANSION  BY [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/modules/members/index.php?id=2847398]EMERALDREIGN[/url]

  °°°  Same resolution as the official high-res DLC textures
 
  °°° As usual, everything has been redone from scratch.
 
  °°°  This work should be compatible with pretty much everything, including remodeled mesh versions 
(for various body replacers) and mods using parts of the set.

[center][color=red]in memory of my beloved Bibi and Gligan...i wish i was able to forget you both [/color][/center]


[youtube]3_tj68bZv84[/youtube] [youtube]9MU2uvfPW8s[/youtube] [youtube]Qm2xgdZeAcs[/youtube][youtube]pdssRTo5b5M[/youtube] [youtube]JvRagn8z3Bs[/youtube]
author: EmeraldReign 83Willow CaBaL
